meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of antheridia
meanings.sent1: The antheridial cells were small and round.
meanings.sent2: The antheridial structures were essential for plant reproduction.
meanings.sent3: The antheridial party in the plant world was always lively.
meanings.sent4: His antheridial nature shone through in his bold actions.
meanings.sent5: The antheridial features of the plant were like tiny gems.

meanings.definition: pertaining to the male reproductive structure in plants
meanings.sent1: The antheridial pollen was crucial for fertilization.
meanings.sent2: The antheridial organs produced pollen grains.
meanings.sent3: The antheridial garden was full of pollen surprises.
meanings.sent4: His antheridial role in the plant community was vital.
meanings.sent5: The antheridial function of the plant was like a well-oiled machine.
